org.sindice.siren.solr.schema

Class TrieDatatype

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.solr.schema.Datatype
      • org.sindice.siren.solr.schema.TrieDatatype

  • public class TrieDatatype
extends Datatype
    Provides a datatype to support for NodeNumericRangeQuery. It supports integer, float, long and double types.

    For each number being of this datatype, multiple terms are generated as per the algorithm described in NodeNumericRangeQuery. The possible number of terms increases dramatically with lower precision steps.

    Note that if you use a precisionStep of 32 for int/float and 64 for long/double, then multiple terms will not be generated, range search will be no faster than any other number field.

    Expert: The query analyzer is used as a container for the numeric range query configuration, and should not be used to analyze query terms.
